      • Personnage

        public Personnage​(int hp,
                  int strength,
                  int critique)
        Creates a character by adding the needed values
        Parameters:
        hp - is for the character's max/base hp
        strength - is for the character's strength
        critique - is the critical strike chance

      • coupCritique

        public void coupCritique​(Personnage ennemi,
                         double valeur)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Allows a critical strike
        Parameters:
        ennemi - is the character hitten by the critical strike
        valeur - is the critical strike chance of the attacking character
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - to avoid errors (It should never get into this exception)
